project_abstract.cdata: The Punjab Forest Sector Development Project will promote sustainable land use in rural areas of Punjab by redirecting public sector involvement towards the expansion of agro-forestry production systems and the rehabilitation of degraded range and scrub land. The project will inter alia support the following components: (a) institutional development; (b) farm forestry expansion; and (c) social range and scrub forest rehabilitation.
